targets.expr:
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase!="Running", phase!="Succeeded", namespace="$namespace"})
+
sum(changes(kube_pod_status_ready{namespace="$namespace", condition="true"}[5m]))
+
(sum(kube_job_status_failed{namespace="$namespace"}) OR on() vector(0))
+
(sum(kube_replicaset_spec_replicas{namespace="$namespace"}) OR on() vector(0)) - (sum(kube_replicaset_status_ready_replicas{namespace="$namespace"}) OR on() vector(0))
+
(sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{namespace="$namespace"}) OR on() vector(0)) - (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{namespace="$namespace"}) OR on() vector(0))
+
(sum(kube_daemonset_status_number_misscheduled{namespace="$namespace"})OR on() vector(0))

100
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}==1))
*
sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container="", pod!="", namespace="$namespace"}[5m]))

topk(1,
  100
  /
  sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}==1)) by (pod)
  *
  sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container="", pod!="", namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) by (pod)
)

100
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}==1))
*
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container="", pod!="", namespace="$namespace"})

topk(1,
  100
  /
  sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}==1)) by (pod)
  *
  sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container="", pod!="", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod)
)

100 / sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace="$namespace", type="hard", resource="requests.cpu"}) by (namespace) * sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace="$namespace", type="used", resource="requests.cpu"}) by (namespace)

100 / sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace="$namespace", type="hard", resource="limits.cpu"}) by (namespace) * sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace="$namespace", type="used", resource="limits.cpu"}) by (namespace)

100 / sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace="$namespace", type="hard", resource="requests.memory"}) by (namespace) * sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace="$namespace", type="used", resource="requests.memory"}) by (namespace)

100 / sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace="$namespace", type="hard", resource="limits.memory"}) by (namespace) * sum(kube_resourcequota{namespace="$namespace", type="used", resource="limits.memory"}) by (namespace)

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}==1))
-
sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[5m]))

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}==1))
-
sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) > 0

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}==1))
-
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!="", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}==1))
-
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!="", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}) > 0

*

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[5m]) * on(pod, namespace) group_left() (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}==1)) by (container, pod)

/
